```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(vroom)
library(readxl)
```


```{r}
# Download Byar & Greene prostate cancer data
url <- "https://hbiostat.org/data/repo/prostate.xls"
destination <- "../data/_raw/prostate.xls"

download.file(url, destination, method = "auto")
```

```{r}
# NOTE: You open prostate.xls and save it again to xlsx
prostate_data <- read_excel('../data/_raw/prostate.xlsx')

raw_data <- as.data.frame(read_csv(file = "~/projects/group_11_repository/data/_raw/prostate.csv", show_col_types = FALSE))

```

```{r}
raw_data <- vroom("~/projects/group_11_repository/data/_raw/prostate.csv", delim =';', show_col_types = FALSE)
```
